I‚Äôm really grateful to Dr. Tan and her team for taking care of me throughout my PRK journey. She was kind and attentive, and patiently answered all my questions on which procedure suited my eyes best. During the surgery and follow-ups, she was gentle and reassuring, which made the whole experience smooth and painless.

There‚Äôs a bit of wait at the clinic, but I found it reasonable and it shows that they give each patient the attention they need.

I highly recommend Dr. Tan and her team to anyone considering laser eye surgery as I'm sure you‚Äôll be well taken care of!

I recently underwent cataract surgery with Dr. Tan Yar Li at Asia Pacific Eye Centre. Dr. Tan is approachable and easy to talk to, making me feel comfortable. Her professionalism and attention to detail were evident as she thoroughly explained the procedure, addressing all my concerns with patience. The surgery itself was swift and painless, and I felt well-cared for throughout. Post-surgery, my vision has improved dramatically, and the recovery process was smooth, thanks to the clear guidance provided. The clinic‚Äôs staff were courteous and efficient, making each visit very pleasant. I highly recommend Dr. Tan to anyone considering eye treatment; her expertise and genuine care are truly commendable

Dr Lee Hung Ming is the true expert for eye lasik surgery. The service I received in APEC was exceptional from the moment I walked in until my day-after check-up.

The procedure it was painless and quick, and healing was simple!

It‚Äôs surreal to wake up in the morning and have perfect vision. I recommend you get this procedure and you get it here at Asia Pacific Eye Centre Singapore. üòçü•∞üòò

I did ICL with Dr Lee and my vision quality has improved since then. This has improved my quality of life, after living with high myopia in my youth.
Although there were some areas to monitor following the surgery, I have been going for annual reviews to make sure everything is safe and in place, which has provided assurance.

We had a wonderful experience with Dr. Wong Chee Wai at Asia Pacific Eye Centre, when bringing in my child for an eye check. The doctor was incredibly patient, gentle, and took the time to make my child feel comfortable throughout the entire process. He explained the diagnosis of myopia clearly and professionally, and gave us helpful guidance on the next steps to manage it. We truly appreciate the care and attention given ‚Äî it made a potentially stressful visit feel reassuring and positive. Highly recommended!
